scenes.description: Performance of the song 'Highlight' by Takanashi Kiara and hololive Indonesia members.
MC section where Kiara introduces her 2025 birthday merchandise.

subtitles.original: Highlight, highlight, highlight, highlight.
subtitles.english: Highlight, highlight, highlight, highlight.

subtitles.original: Highlight, highlight, highlight, yay!
subtitles.english: Highlight, highlight, highlight, yay!

subtitles.original:
That was another banger from Kiara and I did it
with all my beloved ID girls.
subtitles.english:
That was another banger from Kiara and I did it
with all my beloved ID girls.

subtitles.original: I love you, I love you ID girls, I love you so much!
subtitles.english: I love you, I love you ID girls, I love you so much!

subtitles.original:
Yes, so after this wonderful banger, as you may have
noticed, if you look at the time,
subtitles.english:
Yes, so after this wonderful banger, as you may have
noticed, if you look at the time,

subtitles.original:
it might be time to end soon and therefore I will
introduce some merchandise to you guys.
subtitles.english:
it might be time to end soon and therefore I will
introduce some merchandise to you guys.

subtitles.original: It's birthday merchandise time!
subtitles.english: It's birthday merchandise time!

subtitles.original: ではでは誕生日記念のグッズ出るので紹介したいと思います。
subtitles.english:
Well then, birthday commemoration goods are coming
out, so I'd like to introduce them.

subtitles.original: どうぞ見ていきましょう。
subtitles.english: Please, let's take a look.

subtitles.original: Let's check it out!
subtitles.english: Let's check it out!

subtitles.original: That is the overview.
subtitles.english: That is the overview.

subtitles.original: And now let me show you all of them in detail.
subtitles.english: And now let me show you all of them in detail.

subtitles.original: First of all, the tapestry! Ta-da!
subtitles.english: First of all, the tapestry! Ta-da!

subtitles.original: As you can tell, I am in a wedding dress!
subtitles.english: As you can tell, I am in a wedding dress!

subtitles.original: なんと、なんと私、なんか可愛い服着てますね。
subtitles.english:
Wha- wha-, I'm wearing some cute clothes,
aren't I?

subtitles.original: ああ、恥ずかしい。
subtitles.english: Ah, how embarrassing.

subtitles.original: Yeah, um, it's about time right? I don't know.
subtitles.english: Yeah, um, it's about time right? I don't know.

subtitles.original:
It's a beautiful tapestry, I haven't done a tapestry
in a while so I thought you guys deserved one.
subtitles.english:
It's a beautiful tapestry, I haven't done a tapestry
in a while so I thought you guys deserved one.

subtitles.original:
And next, with the same beautiful face and a
different expression perhaps, it will be a little badge.
subtitles.english:
And next, with the same beautiful face and a
different expression perhaps, it will be a little badge.

subtitles.original: So if you are a badge collector, now's the time!
subtitles.english: So if you are a badge collector, now's the time!

subtitles.original:
If you have an itabag or something to fill up, now's
the time to get yourself a wawa badge, a wawawaifu badge!
subtitles.english:
If you have an itabag or something to fill up, now's
the time to get yourself a wawa badge, a wawawaifu badge!

subtitles.original: Oh, and by the way, the illustration is by DOTORI.
subtitles.english: Oh, and by the way, the illustration is by DOTORI.

subtitles.original: Thank you so much, it's so beautiful, I look so cute.
subtitles.english: Thank you so much, it's so beautiful, I look so cute.

subtitles.original: バッジ集めてる人もぜひ今回、どうぞいっぱい買ってください。
subtitles.english:
Those who collect badges too, please do buy
many this time.

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます。
subtitles.english: Thank you very much.

subtitles.original: And next up is the lamp! Yeah!
subtitles.english: And next up is the lamp! Yeah!

subtitles.original: The title is: "You Light Up My Life Lamp".
subtitles.english: The title is: "You Light Up My Life Lamp".

subtitles.original: You! Because it's a chicken, it's a KFP chicken!
subtitles.english: You! Because it's a chicken, it's a KFP chicken!

subtitles.original: はい、私の人生を照らしてくれるのがあなたなので、その姿をしたランプでございます。
subtitles.english:
Yes, because you are the one who lights up
my life, it's a lamp in that form.

subtitles.original:
And next we have the "Anger Management Frog Ball"!
Froggy wawa!
subtitles.english:
And next we have the "Anger Management Frog Ball"!
Froggy wawa!

subtitles.original:
Perfect right? You want to squeeze it and squish
her head, don't you? Me too!
subtitles.english:
Perfect right? You want to squeeze it and squish
her head, don't you? Me too!

subtitles.original: おこ、おこ、おこマネジメント、え、カエルボールでございます。
subtitles.english: Oko-, oko-, oko- management, uh, frog ball.

subtitles.original: フロギーわわの顔付いてるボールです。とてもキュートですけど、
subtitles.english:
It's a ball with Froggy Wawa's face on it.
It's very cute, but...

subtitles.original: 何かね、押したいんだよね、うん。
subtitles.english: you know, you want to press it, yeah.

subtitles.original: And next we have a situational voice! Yes!
subtitles.english: And next we have a situational voice! Yes!

subtitles.original: It is matching with the tapestry actually.
subtitles.english: It is matching with the tapestry actually.

subtitles.original:
So this, it fits you know, like this whole
honeymoon wedding situation.
subtitles.english:
So this, it fits you know, like this whole
honeymoon wedding situation.

subtitles.original:
I normally don't really go that hard on the romance in my
voice packs so it's a very big... just this time, just this once.
subtitles.english:
I normally don't really go that hard on the romance in my
voice packs so it's a very big... just this time, just this once.
